name: The Watcher (itch) (nsanti21, eminasho, DANIELRETAMAL, Cthulhusdoll)
description:
Controls
A / Left Arrow Key - Move left
D / Right Arrow Key - Move right
SPACE / W / Up Arrow Key - Turbo
S / Down Arrow Key - Slow down
ESC - Pause game

This game was developed in less than a week for This is: Chile Jam.

Tutorial Credits
  • Daniel Retamal
  • Francisco Ramírez
  • Nicolás Santibáñez
  • Raimundo Villarroel
  • Emilio Torres
